DOC.brief_summary: Study efficacy endoresection tumor scar , surgery possible , transpupillary thermotherapy tumor scar prevent neovascular glaucoma secondary enucleation
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Evaluating Endoresection Tumor Scar Transpupillary Thermotherapy When Endoresection Not Feasible After Proton Beam Therapy Treatment Large Uveal Melanomas ( Endoresection-Laser )
DOC.criteria: Tumor 7 mm thickness Patients treat proton beam therapy Patients age least 18 year Patients clearly inform study , receive letter information sign consent Massive extrascleral extension posterior equator Patients metastasis diagnosis . Patients glaucoma radiation therapy Patients opaque medium prevent transpupillary thermotherapy Patients follow difficult due geographical , social psychological reason
